```{.r .cell-code}
mpg_modified <- mpg %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    cyl = as_factor(cyl),
    fl = as_factor(fl),
    drv = as_factor(drv),
    class = as_factor(class),
    trans = as_factor(trans)
  )
glimpse(mpg_modified)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
 mpg_modified %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarize(average_hwy = mean(hwy), count = n())
```

```

  cyl   average_hwy count

3 6            22.8    79
4 8            17.6    70
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  group_by(manufacturer) %>%
  summarize(average_cty = mean(cty), count = n())
```
